creator: Daikin Europe N.V.
descriptionHtml:
Madoka Assistant:

This app is intended for advanced users and professional users who can connect their smartphones to the Madoka controller using Bluetooth low energy technology.

Thanks to the Madoka assistant app, the users will have access to an intuitive and user-friendly interface to configure the Madoka controller, hence easier and time saving setting and commissioning.

Advanced users can monitor and control through the app the unit operation. Moreover they will have access to advanced settings such as date, time and setback.

The professional users will have additional access to extended features related to commissioning and maintenance.
descriptionShort: The perfect complement to your Daikin Madoka wired remote controller (BRC1H).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* BRC1H52 support
* added Hebrew as supporting language
* Var­i­ous bug fix­es & im­prove­ments

title: Madoka Assistant

creator: Daikin Europe N.V.
descriptionHtml:
This app is intended for advanced users and professional users who can connect their smartphones to the Madoka controller using Bluetooth low energy technology.

Thanks to the Madoka assistant app, the users will have access to an intuitive and user-friendly interface to configure the Madoka controller, hence easier and time saving setting and commissioning.

Advanced users can monitor and control through the app the unit operation. Moreover they will have access to advanced settings such as date, time and setback.

The professional users will have additional access to extended features related to commissioning and maintenance.
descriptionShort: The perfect complement to your Daikin Madoka wired remote controller (BRC1H).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Various bug fixes & improvements
* Redesign of Field settings
* Added ability to sort controllers on the Home screen
* New controller firmware (for BRC1H52/82)

title: Madoka Assistant

creator: Daikin Europe N.V.
descriptionHtml:
This app is intended for basic, advanced and professional users who can connect their smartphones to the Madoka controller using Bluetooth low energy technology.

Thanks to the Madoka assistant app, the users will have access to an intuitive and user-friendly interface to configure the Madoka controller, hence easier and time saving setting and commissioning.

Basic users can use the app to control all basic parameters of their system in a visually appealing interface.

Advanced users can also use the app to monitor and control the unit operation. Moreover, they will have access to more advanced settings such as date, time and setback.

Professional users will have additional access to extended features related to commissioning and maintenance. You can configure all parameters of the system without hassle and are able to mirror settings to multiple controllers, saving time in the process.

Note: for the Human Comfort Interface (BRC1HHDA*), the app only allows updating the firmware of the controller. No other functionality is available.
descriptionShort: The perfect complement to your Daikin Madoka wired remote controller (BRC1H).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Various bug fixes & improvements
* Redesign of Field settings
* Added ability to sort controllers on the Home screen
* New controller firmware (for BRC1H52/82)

title: Madoka Assistant

creator: Daikin Europe N.V.

descriptionShort: The perfect complement to your Daikin Madoka wired remote controller (BRC1H).

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New controller firmware update (BRC1H): major improvements to connection stability along with various bug fixes and improvements.
From now on more advanced unit settings are hidden, and only shown when Advanced Settings is enabled. You can enable Advanced Settings in About > Advanced Settings.
Introducing Favorites: find and access your favorite unit settings faster and more easily.
Recent Devices: Find your controller faster in the Recent Devices section.

* Remote controller blinking when connecting (for installers)

* Redesign and tablet support
* Dark mode support
* Improved connection and error handling
* Support for Fan Coil Units with the new BRC1H52F
* Local diagnostics

title:
